title: Israel has only prevented Heinz Katchup.
subtitle: Israel did not prohibit the commercial sale of Katchup Heinz; only the country's Ministry of Health ruled that the company had to be reclassified as "Toto spice."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Israel has banned the sale of ketchup with the Heinz brand, in part because of the product ' s use of components derived from genetically modified organisms.
